item.title: PrestonBot has reached stable version
item.description: Some weeks ago, we welcomed a new team member in the core team: Preston(Bot)!

item.title: Introducing PrestonBot
item.description: Some of you may have noticed that a few weeks ago, we have a new team member in the core team: Preston!

item.title: Introducing a new branching model for PrestaShop
item.description: PrestaShop has recently moved towards a more semantic versioning scheme, which is impacting the way we release new versions, and how we work on our GitHub repositories. If you want to contribute code, hereâ€™s a full explanation on how you should do it from now on.
